| **Job Title** | Sales Executive | **Department:** | Sales |
| **Incumbent** |  | **Reports to:** | Director |
| **Date** |  |  |  |

Position Overview

* Prospect, canvass for potential Customers
* Manage and service Customers in terms of Kangopak PS&QMS requirements

Essential Job Functions

* Canvass for Customers
* Call on Customers
* Offer technical, correct pouch specifications on packaging requirements
* Process/Follow up Orders
* Ensure correct pouch specifications are applicable
* Conduct market/supermarket surveys

Requirements

* Previous sales experience
* Technical background
* Excellent inter personal skills
* Attention to detail

Other Skills/Abilities

* Packaging experience
* Computer literate

Employee Manager
